stem: Which of the following is not a type of IAM role?
options/0/rationale: That's incorrect. Custom roles are one of three types of roles in IAM.
options/1/rationale: That's incorrect. Predefined roles are one of three types of roles in IAM.
options/2/rationale: That's correct! There are three types of roles in IAM: basic roles, predefined roles, and custom roles. There are no "advanced" roles in IAM.
options/3/rationale: That's incorrect. Basic roles are one of three types of roles in IAM.

stem: What abstraction is primarily used to administer user access in IAM ?
options/0/title: Credentials, an abstraction of an authorization token.
options/0/rationale: That's incorrect. I recommend going back to the lectures of this module to review this concept.
options/1/title: Roles, an abstraction of job roles.
options/1/rationale: IAM administration uses pre-defined roles for administration of user access. The roles are defined by more granular permissions. But permissions are not applied to users directly, only through the roles that are assigned to them.
options/2/title: Privileges, an abstraction of access rights.
options/2/rationale: That's incorrect. I recommend going back to the lectures of this module to review this concept.
options/3/title: Leases, an abstraction of periodic entitlements.
options/3/rationale: I recommend reviewing the lectures in this module.

stem: Which of the following is not a type of IAM member?
options/0/rationale: That's incorrect. A Google Group is one of five different types of members in IAM.
options/1/rationale: That's correct! There are five different types of members: Google Accounts, Service Accounts, Google Groups, Google Workspace domain, and Cloud Identity domains. There are no "Organization Accounts" in IAM.
options/2/rationale: That's incorrect. A Service Account is one of five different types of members in IAM.
options/3/rationale: That's incorrect. A Google Workspace domain is one of five different types of members in IAM.
options/4/rationale: That's incorrect. A Cloud Identity domain is one of five different types of members in IAM.
options/5/rationale: That's incorrect. A Google Account is one of five different types of members in IAM.
